name: are-na
title: Are.na
description: Are.na is a platform for connecting ideas and building knowledge through visual blocks and channels. This Raycast extension allows users to search for channels, blocks, and users on Are.na, as well as create new channels directly from Raycast. Easily discover, explore, and organize content from your Are.na account without leaving your workflow.
author: alvinkobe

commands.name: search-channels
commands.title: Find Channels
commands.subtitle: Are.na
commands.description: Search and browse through public and private Are.na channels

commands.name: search-blocks
commands.title: Find Blocks
commands.subtitle: Are.na
commands.description: Search for text, images, links and other content blocks across Are.na

commands.name: search-users
commands.title: Find Users
commands.subtitle: Are.na
commands.description: Search for people and organizations with Are.na profiles

commands.name: create-channel
commands.title: Create Channel
commands.subtitle: Are.na
commands.description: Quickly create a new public or private channel on your Are.na account

preferences.name: accessToken
preferences.label: Are.na API Key
preferences.description: Enter your personal Are.na API Key
preferences.title: API Key

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
